title: Was Nancy Pelosi's son employed by a gas company that worked in Ukraine?
subtitle: The allegation is based on an invention that is alleged to be capable of providing cheap energy to billions of people around the world without using fossil fuels.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Paul Belosi, Jr., son of the President of the United States House of Representatives, Nancy Belosi, was an "executive officer of a gas-making company operating in Ukraine."
